name: Not Alone (Cephalon Sugma)
description:
This is an in-development build of a multiplayer horror game where the objective is to be the last player alive and have the monster kill other players first.

In the current build, there is no multiplayer yet and the objective is instead to interact with 6 crows hidden across the map while hiding from the Owl.

Planned Features (In no particular order):

  • Local and Online multiplayer with split screen (up to 6 players at once online, 4 locally)
  • Walls that aren't obvious placeholders
  • Using crows for another purpose such as alerting the Owl to your location
  • Indoor terrain
  • Lockable doors
  • Darker maps and flashlights
  • Fixed UI orientation
  • Falling snow
  • Blood circles that let you sacrifice half your health bar to teleport to another random circle
  • Control configuration
  • Bot controlled players
  • Smartphone support

Known Bugs:

  • You can interact with a crow more than once, allowing the player to win the game by running into a crow over and over again (ignoring this for now since it's only being used until multiplayer is available)

If you run into any problems or have any feedback, be sure to let me know in the comments!
